On 14 Jun 2004, Denis N. Antonioli <antonio@...> wrote:

> There is one problem with ant's xml reports for junit: ant's
> formatter includes all the output of the tested class in a CDATA
> section.  If the unit test outputs itself xml, it may result in a
> CDATA section included in another CDATA section, which is strictly
> forbidden by xml.

Ant deals with this properly starting with 1.5.2.

Stefan
